line_1: Purchas'd by gold, or aw'd by slavish sear,
line_2: Abandon all his ancestors held dear?

line_1: What blasts may yet those opening blossoms sear!
line_2: THESE tender buds that grace the early year,

line_1: "No Hammers thump; no horrid Blacksmith sear,
line_2: " From Village on to Village sounding clear;

line_1: "No Hammers thump; no horrid Blacksmith sear,
line_2: " No Dogs, no Babes, no Wives, to stun your Ear;

line_1: "No Hammers thump; no horrid Blacksmith sear,
line_2: "With Sounds that are a Misery to hear:
